'''Paper Leapfrogging''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Forest of Blessings]], [[Simulanka]]. With this mechanic, the player must control a frog to jump across lilypads and arrive at some destination.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial|Paper Leapfrogging}}

==Dialogue==
===West of Rainsong Pond===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(If the frog does not land on a Lotus Leaf)
::Take note of the Lotus Leaves' position before moving!

;(Complete the puzzle)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Frog:''' I've gotten the hang of it!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Weight of a Treasure Chest===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Nearby paper frog)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Yellow Paper Frog:''' This is just right for holding the weight of a treasure chest...
----
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Paper Frog:''' ''I want to practice a few more times.''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Paper Frog:''' ''That way, competing in the arena won't be beyond my reach!''

;(If the frog does not land on a Lotus Leaf)
::Take note of the Lotus Leaves' position before moving!
----
;(Open the chest after completing the puzzle)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Yellow Paper Frog:''' Ribbit!
:;(The lilypad that once held the chest is pushed up by a waterspout)

;(On a nearby leaf, two hamsters circle an investigation spot)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Hamster A:''' ''Don't get caught now, that's the secret stash!''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Hamster B:''' Got it!

;(Investigate)
:;(Cooking ingredients come out)
:;(The hamsters stop dancing)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Hamster A & B:''' ...
{{Dialogue End}}

===Moving the Lotus Leaves===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach the paper frog)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Paper Frog:''' ''The next lotus leaf...''

;(If the frog does not land on a Lotus Leaf)
::Take note of the Lotus Leaves' position before moving!

;(Reach the third lilypad)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Paper Frog:''' Ribbit! That's way too far!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Yellow Paper Frog:''' Come, friend, let me aid you!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Yellow Paper Frog:''' Guide me as I {{Color|bz|move the lotus leaves}}!''
:{{DIcon}} "Gather the lotus leaves!"
:;(The third and fourth Lotus Leaves gather)
:{{DIcon}} "Separate the lotus leaves!"
:;(The third and fourth Lotus Leaves separate)
{{Dialogue End}}

===Adjusting the Waterspouts===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Nearby paper frog at the destination)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Paper Frog:''' ''Green! Where are you!?''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Paper Frog:''' ''Looks like the performance must be postponed...''
:{{DIcon}} What happened?
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Paper Frog:''' ''The Green Musician has gotten lost beneath the waterfall''
:{{DIcon}} I'll go have a look.
----
;(If the frog does not land on a Lotus Leaf)
::Take note of the Lotus Leaves' position before moving!

;(If the frog lands outside of the area)
::The paper frog landed outside the area...

:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Musician:''' ''We're about to miss the window to perform...''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Musician:''' ''But we can't pass through this waterspout...''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Yellow Paper Frog:''' ''Guide me as I {{Color|bz|adjust the waterspout}}!''
:{{DIcon}} "Adjust the waterspout's height!"
:;(The waterspouts under the second and fourth lilypads change heights)

;(Reach the fourth lilypad)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Musician:''' Feels like we'll be there soon!
----
;(Talk to the first yellow paper frog on the second level)
:{{DIcon}} "Adjust the waterspout's height!"
:;(The waterspouts under the second and third lilypads on the second level change heights)

;(Talk to the second yellow paper frog on the second level)
:{{DIcon}} "Adjust the waterspout's height!"
:;(The waterspouts under the third and fourth lilypads on the second level change heights)

;(Complete the puzzle)
:{{Black Screen|The band is ready...}}
:;(A [[Grand Frog Chorus]] is prepared)
{{Dialogue End}}

===Master and Disciple: Mental Barriers===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Paper Frog:''' ''Can I... really surpass the Master?''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Yellow Paper Frog:''' ''The Path of "Leapfrogging"... requires you to overcome your mental barriers!''
:{{DIcon}} Let me help!

;(If the frog hits the light barrier)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Paper Frog:''' ''Ugh, I still couldn't do it...''
:{{DIcon}} Let's run that back!
:;(Resets puzzle)

;(Complete the puzzle)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Paper Frog:''' Master! I think I've got it!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Master and Disciple: Heart's Path===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Paper Frog:''' ''Can I... really surpass the Master?''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Yellow Paper Frog:''' ''The Path of "Leapfrogging"... requires you to choose a path in your heart!''
:{{DIcon}} Let me help!

;(If the frog hits the light barrier)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Paper Frog:''' ''Ugh, I still couldn't do it...''
:{{DIcon}} Let's run that back!
:;(Resets puzzle)

;(Complete the puzzle)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Paper Frog:''' Master! I think I've got it!
{{Dialogue End}}
